marklogic.body: Look, this is just another example of pointy headed, liberal academics telling everyone how to live...as they are Always the smartest people in the room.Â I'd say so what.Â Leadership positions are typically elected Spots andÂ an atheist or some other non-catholic would never get the vote and probably not even attempt to join the group inÂ the first place.Â However, I fully understand the outrage at these utterly stupid policies.Â
